syllabus:
教學目標:  
The primary goals of this course are to: a) foster an understanding of the fundamental principles of learning and memory, and b) acquire expertise applying learning principles to digital learning environments, and c) critically evaluate the applied theory and research in the field of digital learning.

方法評量(課程要求):

1.Participation(25%) Class presentation and discussion

2.Student Journals(25%) Thought about applying learning theories in digital learning. You are requested to maintain a journal of your thoughts concerning the application of the theories and principles of learning covering in the assigned readings and/or class discussion. The application may be to any area of interest to you.

3.Examination (30%) A mid-term and/or final exam will be administrated as a means of evaluating your comprehension of the basic concepts, principles, theories and findings presented in the reading and class discussions. 

4.Research Proposal(20%) You are requested to propose a research proposal targeting on the application of certain learning theories. A literature review with 10 journal articles cited in APA format should be included in your proposal.
